requirements.summary: Remove the hero image and any hero-image fallback UI from the AuthGate (landing) page while keeping the layout balanced.
acceptanceCriteria: On the AuthGate (landing) page, no image is displayed above the main headline.
The previous fallback 'Hero image' placeholder UI is not rendered anywhere on the landing page.
The page layout remains visually balanced (no large empty container where the image used to be).

file_operations.description: Remove the entire hero-image block (including the and its fallback placeholder UI) from the top of the landing page so nothing renders above the main headline; adjust surrounding spacing/classes as needed to avoid leaving an empty container. (No selected component required.)

requirements.summary: Delete unused AuthGate state and imports that were only used for hero-image error handling to keep the build clean.
acceptanceCriteria: `useState` and the `imageError/setImageError` logic are removed from `frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx` if no longer needed.
The landing page builds without TypeScript/ESLint unused import warnings caused by the removal.

file_operations.description: Remove `useState` import and delete `imageError/setImageError` state plus any onError/fallback-related logic that becomes unused after the hero image removal; ensure imports from `lucide-react` and other modules remain minimal and used.
